data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Novelo-Gutiérrez, Rodolfo, Gómez-Anaya, José Antonio, Smith-Gómez, Sergio Alejandro (2015): Description of the larva of Epigomphus crepidus Kennedy, 1936 (Odonata: Gomphidae). Zootaxa 4027 (4): 587-592, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.4.8
